sentences.english: We must secure from the British unequivocal reaffirmation.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須從英國取得無歧異的再確認。

sentences.english: But differences remain on specifics and philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 但在特定議題和想法上，雙方仍有歧異。

sentences.english: Dreams are more likely to let the more divergent feelings inside us rise to our consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 夢更容易把我們深埋內心的歧異感情上升到意識層面。

sentences.english: The dative markers are very different in Chinese dialects.
sentences.chinese: 雙賓語句中引進與事的介詞在漢語方言中頗有歧異。

sentences.english: About the network morals meaning, at present the theory illustration quite has the difference.

definition: to counter every move/to be full of tricks
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
